EXCEPTIONS.Definition: something that is not included in a rule

RARE.Definition: not common or frequent; very unusual

COMPLAINING.Definition: expressing dissatisfaction or annoyance about something

SPEECH.Definition: the communication or expression of thoughts in spoken words

A BUNCH OF.Definition: a number of things; a lot of

POSSESSIONS.Definition: an item of property; something that belongs to someone

IMPLIES.Definition: to suggest something without saying it directly
